name: AEPDR_DSW_Overview
description: AEP Data Services Data Science Workspace Overview
author: Emily Walpole
meta_keywords: AEP, Data Science, Workspace, Adobe, Overview

pages.title: Data Science Workspace Overview
pages.description: The Data Science Workspace offers predefined machine learning models you can use in your own solutions as well as the capability to create your own models.

pages.title: Data Science Workspace Walkthrough
pages.description: This document will outline the end-to-end workflow a data scientist would go through to solve a problem using machine learning.

pages.title: Predict the future with Data Science Workspace
pages.description: A hands-on tutorial to introduce and familiarize with the workflow of Adobe Experience Platform Data Science Workspace.

pages.title: Retail Sales Recipe
pages.description: The Retail Sales recipe enables you to predict sales forecast for all stores seeded for a certain time period. Learn more about this recipe to see if it is a right fit for your use case.

pages.title: Product Recommendations Recipe
pages.description: The Product Recommendations recipe enables you the ability to provide product recommendations that are tailored to your customer's interests. Learn more about this recipe to see how you can increase sales and improve your customers overall purchasing experience.
